name: Dividend Quality (Experimental)
description: Dividend income focus - screens for yield and payout sustainability
limitations: No 25-year dividend growth history available. Screens for current yield (>1.5%) and payout ratio (<80%) only. Not equivalent to S&P Dividend Aristocrats methodology.
notes: If dividend data is missing, strategy falls back to quality/risk weighting.
Disable in production if yield coverage is low.
